categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic military bases

nodes.text: The Rebel Alliance established a small outpost on the moon Yavin 4 during the Galactic Civil War. In 1 ABY, after the Alliance had evacuated their Yavin Base, Princess Leia Organa stayed at this outpost for a short time.
The outpost was erected in a remote location in the deep jungle. It consisted of two small dome-shaped buildings and was guarded by Alliance soldiers.

This outpost is a location in Sony Online Entertainment's MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies. It was added for the Cries of Alderaan story arc in 2003 as one of five Rebel outposts. Rebel players were sent to these locations during the second act to meet with an Rebel Commander who sents the player to a communications outpost to relay a message to Doctor Vacca. During the third act of the story arc, the players were once again randomly sent to one of the five locations to meet with Princess Leia, who asks the player to defend a research facility.
